title: Russia trying to retrieve U.S. drone remnants after fighter jet confrontation
description: Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin revealed a rare phone call with his Russian counterpart following the stunning confrontation between two Russian fighter jets and an unmanned American drone. Russia said it’s trying to retrieve parts of the drone in the Black Sea. NBC News’ Peter Alexander reports.

title: Illegal border crossings into U.S. from Canada at record levels
description: America’s newest border crisis takes place up north, with nearly 70,000 crossings from the Canadian side since October. NBC News’ Julia Ainsley went on an exclusive trip with local police patrolling New York’s border with Canada to learn more about the issue.

title: Russian leadership approved aggressive actions of jets that damaged U.S. drone, U.S. officials say
description: Three U.S. officials familiar with the intelligence said the highest levels of the Kremlin approved the aggressive actions of Russian jets against a U.S. drone over the Black Sea.

title: Bipartisan letter to Biden calls for easing restrictions that impact Cuba's private sector
description: A bipartisan group of U.S. Senators are urging  President Joe Biden to ease restrictions on Cuba's private sector which can also help American exports, they say.

title: Salvadorans in poll favor Bukele for re-election despite constitutional ban
description: Nearly 70% of Salvadorans favor President Nayib Bukele’s bid for a second term, a local newspaper poll found despite a constitutional ban on consecutive terms.

title: Few Guatemalan children are reunited with parents through U.S. program, report finds
description: Few Guatemalan children have arrived in the U.S. through a program aimed to reunite them with parents in the U.S., a report by Refugees International found.

title: YouTuber loses seat in Japan's Parliament after never showing up to work
description: GaaSyy, a YouTuber-turned-lawmaker, was expelled from Japan’s upper house over his continuous absence from parliamentary sessions since being elected last year.

title: Russia warns U.S. to stop 'hostile' activity near its border after drone incident over the Black Sea
description: Russia has warned the U.S. to cease “hostile” flights near its border after the U.S. military said fighter jets collided with a Reaper drone over the Black Sea.

title: Has the mystery of Leonardo da Vinci's mother finally been solved?
description: Leonardo da Vinci's mother was a slave called Caterina who was trafficked from the Caucasus to Italy, according to new research outlined in a book unveiled Tuesday.

title: Honduras to seek official ties with China, deepening Taiwan’s isolation
description: The president of Honduras said her government will seek to establish diplomatic relations with China, which would imply severing relations with Taiwan.

title: Supporters of Pakistan's ex-leader Imran Khan clash with police trying to arrest him
description: LAHORE, Pakistan — Pakistani police scuffled with supporters of former Prime Minister Imran Khan on Tuesday as officers arrived outside his home to arrest him for failing to appear in court on graft charges, police and officials said.
